title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description:If the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but has a valid value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the key is blank.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Leave the key blank but add a valid value. 3. View the chart and check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
